title: UPDATE 1-GM Cruise robotaxi unit faces US probes over dragging incident, vows reforms
description: GM's Cruise self-driving car unit on Thursday revealed U.S. Justice Department and Securities and Exchange Commission probes stemming from an October accident in which one of its robotaxis dragged a pedestrian who had been struck by another car.

title: French top court nixes cushy visa deal for rich Brits
description: "The Constitutional Court has green-lit the government's original bill," Interior Minister Gérald Darmanin, who spearheaded the legislation, tweeted on X. "Never has a law provided so many means for expelling delinquents and so many obligations to integrate newcomers."

title: Reform UK support surges to record high
description: Reform UK is more popular than at any point in its history, according to opinion polling, which shows 13 per cent of Britons would vote for the party if the general election was held now.

title: Ohio State Bar Association presents report and recommendations for how to reform Ohio’s indigent defense system before General Assembly task force
description: On Thursday, Immediate Past-President Dean Wilson and Government Relations Manager Marisa Myers of the Ohio State Bar Association (Ohio Bar) presented at the inaugural meeting of a General Assembly task force proposed reforms for the state’s indigent defense system.

title: Council leaders call for reform of local government finance following ‘drop in the ocean’ emergency fund for social care
description: COUNCIL leaders have called for reform of local government finance and an end to “short-term” measures after Michael Gove confirmed that authorities will receive £500 million in emergency funding for social care.

title: State Pension proposal to link amount to minimum wage would see huge weekly rise
description: A proposed reform to the State Pension would see the amount linked to the minimum wage and paid from an earlier age, bringing a huge increase to millions. Campaigners want to see the State Pension lifted to £549.12 per week from April 2024, far higher than the £221.20 the full new State Pension will reach at that time.

title: Milei's Argentina 'omnibus' bill faces gauntlet after clearing first hurdle
description: BUENOS AIRES (Reuters) - Argentine President Javier Milei's "omnibus" bill, a sprawling reform package ranging from tax hikes to privatizations, has cleared its first hurdle in Congress with a green light from a lower house committee. It now faces far tougher obstacles.

title: Politics latest news: Tories ‘serve no purpose’, says Farage after Reform records highest ever support

title: Labour holds huge 34-point lead in key marginal seats, YouGov poll finds
description: Labour holds a mammoth lead over the Tories in the key marginals it needs to win a majority at the general election, a new YouGov poll has found. Sir Keir Starmer ’s party is an incredible 34 points ahead of Rishi Sunak ’s party in 150 crucial target constituencies.
